Package algoDiffusion

Interface AlgorithmeDiffusion

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiffusionAtomique, DiffusionEpoque, DiffusionSequentielle
    public interface AlgorithmeDiffusion
    Represents the diffusion algorithm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void configure​(Capteur c)
      Allows to configure the diffusion algorithm by injecting a sensor.
      void diffuse()
      Starts the execution of the algorithm.
      void releaseSemaphore()
      Allows to release a token on the semaphore.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure​(Capteur c)
        Allows to configure the diffusion algorithm by injecting a sensor.
        Parameters:
        c - is a Capteur (the sensor) (not null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the c is null

      • diffuse

        void diffuse()
      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Starts the execution of the algorithm. The capteur must not be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the capteur is null
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is waiting for a token and an interrupt signal will be thrown

      • releaseSemaphore

        void releaseSemaphore()
        Allows to release a token on the semaphore. It is used by the sensor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the semaphore is null
